Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class CliManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.CliManager
  • public class CliManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the printing of game on command line interface.

    • Method Detail

      • displayAll

        public void displayAll​(ModelView modelView)
        Shows all parts of game.
        Parameters:
        modelView - is the instance containing the actual match information

      • displaySquare

        private void displaySquare​(SquareView square,
                           int printingRow)
        Manages the printing of a single square of the board.
        Parameters:
        square - is the square to be shown
        printingRow - is the cli's row of the single square that is being shown

      • displayTopHorizontalConnection

        private void displayTopHorizontalConnection​(SquareView square)
        Manages the printing of the top-horizontal connection of a square.
        Parameters:
        square - is the square whose connection is being shown

      • displayBottomHorizontalConnection

        private void displayBottomHorizontalConnection​(SquareView square)
        Manages the printing of the bottom-horizontal connection of a square.
        Parameters:
        square - is the square whose connection is being shown

      • displayCorner

        private void displayCorner​(Connection vertical,
                           Connection horizontal,
                           java.lang.String corner)
        Manages the printing of the corner of a square.
        Parameters:
        vertical - is the vertical connection consecutive to the corner
        horizontal - is the horizontal connection consecutive to the corner
        corner - is the default corner, printing if both vertical and horizontal connection are walls or doors

      • displayAdditionalSpace

        private void displayAdditionalSpace​(Connection vertical,
                                    Connection horizontal)
        Manages the printing of horizontal additional spaces between squares.
        Parameters:
        vertical - is the right-side connection of the square
        horizontal - is the horizontal connection of the square

      • displayHorizontalConnection

        private void displayHorizontalConnection​(Connection side,
                                         int column)
        Manages the printing of the horizontal connection of a square.
        Parameters:
        side - is the horizontal connection that is being shown
        column - is the number of square's column on the board

      • displayVerticalConnection

        private void displayVerticalConnection​(Connection side,
                                       boolean isMiddle,
                                       int row)
        Manages the printing of the vertical connection of a square.
        Parameters:
        side - is the vertical connection that is being shown
        isMiddle - tells if the method is printing the middle-vertical segment of the connection (it is used for the printing of doors and board's coordinates)
        row - is the number of square's row on the board

      • displaySquareInformation

        private java.lang.String displaySquareInformation​(SquareView square,
                                                  int row)
        Manages the building as a string of the various information about a square.
        Parameters:
        square - is the square whose information is being shown
        row - is the cli's row that is being printed
        Returns:
        the string containing information about a given square

      • displayRightSideInformation

        private void displayRightSideInformation​(int row,
                                         ModelView modelView)
        Manages the printing of all information at the right-side of board.
        Parameters:
        row - is the cli's row that is being printed
        modelView - is the model from which information is taken

      • displayEnemiesInformation

        private void displayEnemiesInformation​(PlayerView enemy,
                                       boolean isOnDuty)
        Manages the printing of all information at the bottom-side of board (about enemies).
        Parameters:
        enemy - is the enemy whom information is being shown
        isOnDuty - tells if an enemy is on duty during match

      • setDisplayColored

        private java.lang.String setDisplayColored​(Color color)
        Gets the ANSI-code setter associated to a given colour.
        Parameters:
        color - is the color need to be set
        Returns:
        the ANSI code

      • displayColoredAmmoTile

        private java.lang.String displayColoredAmmoTile​(java.lang.String ammoTile)
        Manages the colouring of an ammotile's acronym
        Parameters:
        ammoTile - is the string representing an ammotile to be colored
        Returns:
        the string representing an ammotile with ANSI color setters

      • getPlayerIdAndNickname

        private java.lang.String getPlayerIdAndNickname​(PlayerView player,
                                                boolean isOnDuty)
        Gets player's id and nickname as a string and make it green coloured it if that player is on duty.
        Parameters:
        player - is the player whom id and nickname are requested
        isOnDuty - tells if the player is on duty
        Returns:
        the (colored) string containing id and nickname of a given player

      • printDamages

        private void printDamages​(PlayerView player)
        Manages the printing of a player's damages.
        Parameters:
        player - is the player whom damages are being printed
